segments.text: Dad , can you buy a new camera ? My old one has gone west .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? I gave it to you only 3 months ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , you didn ’ t buy a good one for me . This time how about a better one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , son . I think I ’ Ve go to tell you the truth . My company has gone out and I ’ m now out of job . If you want a new camera , go and earn money yourself .
segments.speaker: S2
